Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On December 18, 2020, Zoom Video Communications, Inc. (the “Company”) issued a blog post regarding the announcement by the United States Department of Justice that a former employee of the Company has been charged with conspiracy to commit interstate harassment and unlawful conspiracy to transfer a means of identification in connection with an alleged scheme to disrupt video meetings commemorating Tiananmen Square . The Company also released its December 18, 2020 transparency report. Copies of the blog post and transparency report are attached hereto as Exhibits 99.1 and 99.2, respectively.

subsections.Exhibits: Exhibit No. 99.1: Blog post dated December 18, 2020. Exhibit No. 99.2: Transparency report dated December18, 2020.
